metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4209 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS. As Nettle's hash update functions internally call memcpy, providing zero-length input may cause undefined behavior. This flaw leads to a denial of service after authentication in rare circumstances.

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
